verses.verse: Then <S%H5281>Naomi<s%> her mother in <S%H2545>law<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, My <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, shall I not <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4494>rest<s%> for thee, that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee?

And now is not <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> of our <S%H4130>kindred<s%>, with whose <S%H5291>maidens<s%> thou wast? Behold, he <S%H2219>winnoweth<s%> <S%H8184>barley<s%> to <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%>.

<S%H7364>Wash<s%> thyself therefore, and <S%H5480>anoint<s%> thee, and <S%H7760>put<s%> thy <S%H8071>raiment<s%> upon thee, and get thee <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H1637>floor<s%>: but make not thyself <S%H3045>known<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%>, until he shall have <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%>.

And it shall be, when he lieth <S%H7901>down<s%>, that thou shalt <S%H3045>mark<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> where he shall <S%H7901>lie<s%>, and thou shalt go <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H1540>uncover<s%> his <S%H4772>feet<s%>, and lay thee <S%H7901>down<s%>; and he will <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee what thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%>.
And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, All that thou <S%H559>sayest<s%> unto me I will <S%H6213>do<s%>.
¶ And she went <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H1637>floor<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that her mother in <S%H2545>law<s%> <S%H6680>bade<s%> her.

And when <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> had <S%H398>eaten<s%> and <S%H8354>drunk<s%>, and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H3190>merry<s%>, he <S%H935>went<s%> to lie <S%H7901>down<s%> at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the heap of <S%H6194>corn<s%>: and she <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3909>softly<s%>, and <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H4772>feet<s%>, and laid her <S%H7901>down<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass at <S%H2677%H3915>midnight<s%>, that the <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H2729>afraid<s%>, and <S%H3943>turned<s%> himself: and, behold, a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> at his <S%H4772>feet<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Who art thou? And she <S%H559>answered<s%>, I am <S%H7327>Ruth<s%> thine <S%H519>handmaid<s%>: <S%H6566>spread<s%> therefore thy <S%H3671>skirt<s%> over thine <S%H519>handmaid<s%>; for thou art a near <S%H1350>kinsman<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be thou of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, my <S%H1323>daughter<s%>: for thou hast <S%H3190>shewed<s%> more <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in the latter <S%H314>end<s%> than at the <S%H7223>beginning<s%>, inasmuch as thou <S%H3212%H310>followedst<s%> <S%H1115>not<s%> young <S%H970>men<s%>, whether <S%H1800>poor<s%> or <S%H6223>rich<s%>.

And now, my <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, <S%H3372>fear<s%> not; I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to thee all that thou <S%H559>requirest<s%>: for all the <S%H8179>city<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> doth <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou art a <S%H2428>virtuous<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>.
And now it is <S%H551>true<s%> that I am thy near <S%H1350>kinsman<s%>: howbeit there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> <S%H7138>nearer<s%> than I.

<S%H3885>Tarry<s%> this <S%H3915>night<s%>, and it shall be in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, that if he will perform unto thee the part of a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%>, <S%H2896>well<s%>; let him do the kinsman's <S%H1350>part<s%>: but if he <S%H2654>will<s%> not do the part of a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> to thee, then will I do the part of a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> to thee, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>: lie <S%H7901>down<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

¶ And she <S%H7901>lay<s%> at his <S%H4772>feet<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>: and she rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H2958>before<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> could <S%H5234>know<s%> <S%H7453>another<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Let it not be <S%H3045>known<s%> that a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1637>floor<s%>.

Also he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3051>Bring<s%> the <S%H4304>vail<s%> that thou hast upon thee, and <S%H270>hold<s%> it. And when she <S%H270>held<s%> it, he <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> measures of <S%H8184>barley<s%>, and <S%H7896>laid<s%> it on her: and she <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And when she <S%H935>came<s%> to her mother in <S%H2545>law<s%>, she <S%H559>said<s%>, Who art thou, my <S%H1323>daughter<s%>? And she <S%H5046>told<s%> her all that the <S%H376>man<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to her.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, These <S%H8337>six<s%> measures of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> he me; for he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H935>Go<s%> not <S%H7387>empty<s%> unto thy mother in <S%H2545>law<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> she, Sit <S%H3427>still<s%>, my <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, until thou <S%H3045>know<s%> how the <S%H1697>matter<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%>: for the <S%H376>man<s%> will not be in <S%H8252>rest<s%>, <S%H518>until<s%> he have <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
